reviews.customers_say: Customers find the wedding dress well-made and elegant, with flattering belly area and figure-hugging design.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully styled, great price point!
items.body: We’ve been married almost 20 years, but just this past August 2025, we took the step to take vows and become crowned in the Holy Orthodox Church. Though I could have bought a dress from one of the many boutiques in the area, this one caught my eye one day when just skimming over dresses here. I decided to order it as a “just in case” dress. My sweet husband was prepared to spend hundreds, if not more on my dress. But the price on this lovely gown was so reasonable, it made sense to buy it as a back up. Once it arrived and I tried it on, I was amazed at the high quality, perfect fit, and elegant drape of the fabric. After looking around at a couple of boutiques, I decided I would go with this wonderful “back up” dress. Boy was my husband surprised! He said some funny things about how he thought I might be a bit more difficult to please, etc. Anyway, it looked WONDERFUL — making our Crowning Ceremony and reception more beautiful than we ever imagined. High quality for the very low price. I’m not sure if it comes in other colors, but it would be lovely for other formal events as well. Read more
items.author: Texasdragonslayer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits -stretches-sexy
items.body: Loved the dress, it’s True to size. Fits comfortably. Great material stretches over curvy areas and no problems zipping. I am larger bust however and would have loved ability to take pads out at bust for more room to manipulate breasts higher with inserts or bra-but it’s okay. My NEW husband was shocked and cried when he saw me! It was perfect for our impromptu beach wedding of our dreams-believe that! We would choose it again!! Great value for the money. Enjoy the pictures. Taken with our few guests iPhone/androids. Read more
items.author: K Perkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost my wedding dress
items.body: I was scared about not being able to get a wedding dress in time for my wedding so I ordered this one. It fit beautifully and true to size. I felt so pretty. Was it my dream dress, no. Would I have happily eloped in it? Absolutely! Luckily though I ended up finding a different stunning dress for my big day. But I highly recommend this to any brides on a budget! Read more
items.author: Melanie Evans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This dress is so pretty! I used it as a base and modified it to add extra flowers and lace, it's so pretty and flowy, it does run a little big, I liked the bigger size because it made it more flowy, but it definitely was loose around my waist. Highly recommend, it's great quality. Read more
items.author: bl8ck1c3

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: Very cheap looking . Also ran small . Read more
items.author: Saundra Seidel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Runs Small
items.body: Nice dress just make sure you go up 2 sizes Read more
items.author: Bea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, simple and flattering dress
items.body: I bought this for my small intimate wedding and couldn't be happier. As a curvy woman, it was flattering and comfortable and felt amazing on my special day. I could have sized up. It has a nice stretch to it, but it was still a bit snug on my hips. I did have to alter the straps because I'm smaller on top, the straps would fall off my shoulders. Quality was way thicker and better than I expected. Having a small train was a nice touch on this simple dress. Read more
items.author: Vb227

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress does not disappoint. It looks and feels great!
items.body: I used this dress for my 30 yr. Vow renewal. I used the info from the previous posts and photos to help me make my decision. I am 5ft. 1 inch tall and 120 lbs. I purchased size 4. It was true to my size. The dress fit perfectly. The material felt very smooth on my skin. The small train was perfect. Dress is simple, but very elegant. I wore a strapless bra and thong so everything was smooth. The belly area has some give but not a lot so consider this. I did ab work to make sure I had no problem. The only issue I had was getting the zipper up my back side due to how the zipper and stitch were sewn but with care it zipped. I love this dress. Priced reasonable and very elegant! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
